se.sics.assertionServer.databaseAccess
Class SQLConnector

java.lang.Object
  se.sics.assertionServer.databaseAccess.SQLConnector
All Implemented Interfaces:
DBConnector
public class SQLConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements DBConnector

This class provides SQL database connectivity for the Attribute Authority.

Author:
Ludwig Seitz

Constructor Detail

SQLConnector

public SQLConnector(java.lang.String dbUrl,
                    java.lang.String user,
                    java.lang.String pwd)
             throws java.sql.SQLException
Create a new database connector either from given values or the defaults.

Parameters:
dbUrl - the database URL, if null the default will be used
user - the database user, if null the default will be used
pwd - the database user's password, if null the default will be used
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

select

public java.sql.ResultSet select(java.lang.String subject,
                                 java.lang.String soa,
                                 java.lang.String attrId,
                                 java.lang.String dataType)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
Do a retrieval of attribute values. This does either:
  • Retrieve a specific attribute for a subject, needs: subject, soa, attrId, dataType
  • Retrieve all attributes for a subject, needs: subject; rest is null
  • Retrieve all subjects and values for a specific attribute, needs: soa, attrId, dataType; subject is null.

Specified by:
select in interface DBConnector
Parameters:
subject - the subject of the attribute. If this is null, soa, attrId and dataType must not be null
soa - the Source Of Authority for the Attribute. If this is null, subject must not be null
attrId - the attribute identifier. If this is null, subject must not be null
dataType - the data type of the attribute. If this is null subject must not be null
Returns:
the results of the SELECT query
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
